colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS BA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LTONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKANGS DANG, BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA GNYIS PA @008A *, ,KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GI MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHRUGS PA'I 'TSUB LTONGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHING TU MANG BA DANG, LHAG PAR LO LNGA PHYIR TE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS MI 'DRA LA MANG DU 'CHED CING, MI SHIS LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA'I 'KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKONGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOD SHAR BA BZHIN, LAG LEN DU LTAR SKABS, ,^ BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRANG CUNG ZAD BSGYUR CING, ,LAG LEN DU GSAL BAR BGYES TE, DBEN GNAS BDE CHEN GLING DU KLAG CHO GA CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, 'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI GNYAN PAS, ,GAR THOD THOD DU BYA MI RUNG GSUNG PAS SNOD MIN LA GSANG SHING SKABS SHES PAR BYA'O,, ,,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
